title: Special topics
content:
We are offered special topics for CSE, is it compulsory to opt one; if so do we have exams for it.
I’d like to get some details on these topics and their impact on further sems pls
The topics are:
C++
R
Unix shell programming

comments.body: This question was asked just 2 days ago - please search this subreddit next time for relevant answers before directly jumping to post a duplicate one.
It’s better to take up the special topics when offered or else the credits backlog will build up and will add unnecessary pressure in the last semesters.
